name: "We need every single one of you to develop your talents, skills and intellect so you can help solve our most difficult problems. If you don’t do that – if you quit on school – you’re not just quitting on yourself, you’re quitting on your country." Thats not indoctrination – thats much-needed inspiration for young people everywhere.
